name: Walk Sim (yz5698)
description:
This is a 1st person narrative game. 

You are a lonely traveler. You entered a deserted town by accident. 

There are two levels in this game. The first level is based on exploration and collection. You need to navigate through a town and collect all 15 coins. Advance to the green platform and proceed to the next level. 

The second level is a shooting range for you to practice shooting skills. There are moving targets and some pushable objects. The green platform will bring you back to town.

Have fun!
